cast.overview: After the death of a United States Senator, idealistic Jefferson Smith is appointed as his replacement in Washington. Soon, the naive and earnest new senator has to battle political corruption.
cast.title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington

details.biography: Garry Armand Watson (September 27, 1928) is an American actor, and part of The Watson Family, an American family of nine sibling actors who are known as "the first family of Hollywood." They were initially active as child actors in silent motion picture films. Garry debuted at age 1 in the 1929 film Drag and is the last living actor from the Hollywood silent film era.
details.name: Garry Watson
